overview: In a new style of reality porn inspired by her spur-of-the-moment reunion with superstud Nacho Vidal, new Evil Angel director Bobbi Starr presents "Shut Up And Fuck." Bobbi's motto is, "No stopping, no editing, go anywhere, do anything." These intense scenes are captured on the fly, much like a live broadcast, and then only minimally edited. And the unplanned, unscripted fuck sessions brim with raw energy, emotion and sexuality.
title: Shut Up and Fuck
